sense.gloss: resounding (sound of bells, musical instruments, stones being struck, etc.)
echoing beautifully (of the sound produced by striking together jewels or metals), beautiful (of a melody, etc.)
tinkling (of metal, jewels, etc.), ringing brightly

meanings: tinkling of jade or metal pendants
